titleStmt.title: The Essex champion, or, The famous history of Sir Billy of Billerecay and his squire Ricardo
titleStmt.author: Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Winstanley by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Date of publication suggested by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: faded and stained, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
